module_restrictions: Postgraduate modules are not open to undergraduate exchange students.
The Health and Society programme, is only available for fee-paying exchange students.
Medicine, Dentistry, Nursing & Midwifery faculties do not accept exchange students.
visa_info: Standard Visitor Visa is applicable only to applicants who are coming for a single semester and entering on a Standard Visitor Visa.

Students can meet the English language requirement by completing a minimum of a year of degree level study or higher at their home institution (NUS) on a programme which has an English language requirement equivalent to KCL Band D.

For students requiring a Student Visa: Applicants who are attending for one semester or a full year can meet the English Language Requirements via the tests or exams that are detailed on KCL’s website under Band B.
accommodations_info: The College offers a variety of accommodation within its own halls of residences and also the University of London Intercollegiate Residences.
cost_of_living: Detailed breakdown of living costs is available at https://www.kcl.ac.uk/study/london/budget and https://www.kcl.ac.uk/study/undergraduate/fees-and-funding/living-expenses
